title: Requirements
content:
# Requirements

Before starting Mixeway there are couple things to mention.
###Software requirements:
| Software   | Version | Info
| ------------- | ------------- | ------------- |
| Docker-compose  | 2.4+  | To Run Mixeway
| Vault  | 1.3+  | Secret and password management, read more in Vault Section
| PostgreSQL  | 9.6+  | Optional, if no postgresql details are provided, mixeway use in memory H2 database


# Integrations:
| Software Name  | Version |
| ------------- | ------------- |
| OpenStack  | Octa +  |
| Nessus  | 6   |
| OpenVAS  | 9   |
| Nexpose  | 6.5+  |
| Acunetix  | 11+   |
| Fortify  | 18.1+   |
| Checkmarx  | 8.6+   |
| OWASP DependencyTrack  | 3.6+   |
